title: Surrender To Love
alternative_title: Feelings Arises When Your Hands Are Tied ; Helplessness Accomplishes Emotions ; Shù Shǒu Jiù Qíng ; Surrender (San Shier) ; 束手就情
status: Feelings Arises When Your Hands Are Tied ; Helplessness Accomplishes Emotions ; Shù Shǒu Jiù Qíng ; Surrender (San Shier) ; 束手就情
description:
Description :
        Cen Jing is a detective who is investigating a mysterious thief called the Queen of Hearts. By chance, she handcuffs herself to Ji Shuanrong, a bar dancer who is actually her former client. To get her back on the right path, Cen Jing infiltrates her life and discovers that she is the Queen of Hearts she has been looking for. But as they get involved, Cen Jing realizes there are more secrets behind her identity...

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 6: So I Can Do Whatever I Want?
Chapter 1: Even If You Won Today
